channelinfo.Description: Shows information about the current channel or mentioned channel.

userinfo.Description: Shows information about yourself or another user.

ping.Description: Gets current ping to Discord's servers

commands.Description: List all of the bot's commands from a certain module. You can either specify the full name or only the first few letters of the module name.

h.Description: Either shows a help for a single command, or DMs you help link if no parameters are specified.

time.Description: Shows the current time and timezone for the specified location.

image.Description: Searches Google Images with the specified query, returns first result.

randomimage.Description: Searches Google Images with the specified query, returns a random result.

movie.Description: Searches omdb with the specified query, returns first result.

weather.Description: Looks up weather of specified city using Dark Sky's api.

urbandict.Description: Searches urban dictionary for with the specified query.

addquote.Description: Adds a new quote with the specified name and message.

showquote.Description: Shows a random quote with a specified name.

quotesearch.Description: Shows a random quote for a keyword that contains any text specified in the search.

quoteid.Description: Displays the quote with the specified ID number. Quote ID numbers can be found by typing `{0}liqu [num]` where `[num]` is a number of a page which contains 15 quotes.

quotedelete.Description: Deletes a quote with the specified ID. You have to be either server Administrator or the creator of the quote to delete it.

listquotes.Description: Lists all quotes on the server ordered alphabetically or by ID. 15 Per page.

textoimage.Description: Returns an image showing the specified mathematical formula, using the TeX language.

pokemon.Description: Returns a short summary of the specified Pok√©mon.

ability.Description: Returns the description of the specified ability.

move.Description: Returns the description of the specified move.

nature.Description: Returns the modifiers of the specified nature.

item.Description: Returns the description of the specified item.

pins.Description: Returns the latest pin in the current channel.

xkcd.Description: Returns the specified xkcd comic, if no comic is specified, latest comic is shown.

queue.Description: Searches and plays the query for the specified song, or plays the url provided. Must be in a voice channel.

pause.Description: Pauses the current track playing. Must be in a voice channel.

destroy.Description: Stops the bot from playing music. Must be in a voice channel.

volume.Description: Sets the volume for the music player. Between 0-100. Must be in a voice channel

listqueue.Description: Shows the current track queue (10 tracks per page).

songremove.Description: Removes the specified track in the queue.

songseek.Description: Seeks the given number of seconds forward in the current track.

twitter.Description: Returns the latest tweets by the specified user.

twittersearch.Description: Searches twitter with the specified query, and returns the top 5 results.

anime.Description: Returns top 5 anime results provided from the query.

experience.Description: Shows the current level and xp of the specified user, if none provided, shows the message author's level and xp

xpleaderboard.Description: Shows the current xp leaderboard, you can specify the page, default is the top 9.

xpnotification.Description: Sets the preferred location of xp level up notifications (Server, Dm, or None).

pick.Description: Picks up all the currency dropped in the current channel.

leaderboard.Description: Shows the current currency leaderboard. you can specify the page, default is the top 9.

drop.Description: Drops the specified number of currency, default is 1. Must have enough in your balance to drop.

betflip.Description: Bet to guess result if heads or tails. Guessing correctly awards you currency.

give.Description: Transfers currency to the specified user, optionally with a message. Must have sufficient balance.

cash.Description: Shows how much currency the user has.

betroll.Description: Bet to roll a dice. Rolling over 70 yields x2.5, over 90 yields x4, and 100 yields x10.

currencytransactions.Description: Shows your currency transactions on the specified page.

betflipmulti.Description: Bet to guess multiple coin flips. You need to bet at least twice the amount of guesses in stones. Needs 3/4 to be correct. The more correct guess rewards more currency. (amount * correct ^ 1.1)

betpokemongame.Description: Bet on an AI vs AI game of pokemon. Default is Generation 7 (Available Generations: 7, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1). If guessed winner correctly, win stones.

betpokemonreplay.Description: Gets the replay of a bet pokemon game.

trivia.Description: Starts a new 10 question trivia game with optional category (use `.tc` to check categories). Default is all categories. Awards currency based on difficulty. Needs at least 60% to get rewards.

jackpot.Description: Shows the current jackpot for the lottery.

joinlottery.Description: Purchases a lottery ticket for 10 currency. Can choose own numbers or one will be automatically generated. (Choose from 1-40, no duplicates)

joinlotterymulti.Description: Purchases multiple lottery tickets for 10 currency each. Numbers will be automatically generated. Minimum purchase is 2.

tickets.Description: Shows the tickets you have for the current lottery. If a page is specified, you can see your ticket numbers. (9 per page).

nextdraw.Description: Shows when the next lottery draw will be.

store.Description: Shows the Stone store. 9 items per page. Or specify specific name or id to see that item.

buy.Description: Buy an item from the store using its name or id, with an optional amount or all (default is 1).

mute.Description: Mutes the specified user (Prevents them from speaking in voice). Must be a moderator or have an available power (Consumes the power).

block.Description: Blocks the specified user (Prevents them from typing in chat). Must be a moderator or have an available power (Consumes the power).

timeout.Description: Times out the specified user (Prevents them from typing and speaking). Must be a moderator or have an available power (Consumes the power). Does not stack with `.mute` and `.block`.

inventory.Description: Shows the items in your inventory

stockstats.Description: Shows the statistics of the specified stock, optional all details

stockquote.Description: Shows current quote of the specified stock

stocknews.Description: Shows the current news about the specified company

stockcompany.Description: Shows details about the specified company

stockprice.Description: Shows the current price of the stock for the specified company

stockposition.Description: Long or short shares of a company. Shorted shares will be charged a premium every week.

stocksell.Description: Sell a specified amount of shares.

transfer.Description: Transfers stones to/from your investing account and cash account. Note: you will lose your cents on your transfer (rounded up)

portfolio.Description: Shows your or the specified user's portfolio.

stockchart.Description: Shows the chart for the specified company, default is 1m. Options are `5y` `2y` `1y` `ytd` `6m` `3m` `1m` `5d` `today`
